| History                 = The Luftwaffe was one of the branches of [[National Socialist German Workers Party (Earth-616)|Nazi Germany's]] [[Wehrmacht (Earth-616)|Wehrmacht]]. Its task was to bomb villages or enemy soldiers with fighter planes. The leader and founder of this branch was [[Hermann Göring (Earth-616)|Hermann Göring]] who, prior to the foundation, also was a associate of the [[Manfred von Richthofen (Earth-616)|Red Baron]].{{Citation}}
